title: Creating dynamic text boxes in queries
description: You can use dashboard parameters and assignment to build dynamic text boxes that show summary metrics or context such as selected host, timeframe, or counts.

examples.name: Example
examples.description: Creates a text field that can be surfaced in a dashboard widget to narrate what the query results show for a selected host.
examples.query:
#event_simpleName=ProcessRollup2 ComputerName=?host
| groupBy(ComputerName, function=count(as="ProcessEvents"))
| text := format("Host %s ran %d process events in the selected period", field=[ComputerName, ProcessEvents])
